attributes.action: change the law and make it illegal to consume any alcohol and drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like the law changed to forbid the consumption of any alcohol whilst in charge of a viecle  we want a zero tollerance policy backed up with a public awarness program

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
